title: Customer Service Representative || Hybrid || Only Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Voice Process,BPO,Customer Service,International Call Center,Calling,Inbound Calls,Voice Support,Bpo Voice

ambitionBoxData.Title: Sutherland Global Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job description


Dear Connections,


Greetings from Sutherland,


"This exciting opportunity is based in our Mumbai office. To ensure seamless collaboration, candidates residing within a designated travel boundary will be considered.


|| Urgent Hiring for Ecommerce and Telecommunications Process ||


Sutherland is hiring for International Voice Process (customer service)


*Shift Timings: 5 Days working with 24*7 Rotational Shifts and 2 Rotational Off.


*Salary: 18000 to 30000.


*HSC or Graduate freshers can apply.


*1 year of international BPO experience can also apply.


*Immediate Joiners can apply.


*Need experience in International Bpo of minimum 1 year on paper.


*Location: Airoli.


* Are you passionate about exceeding customer expectations? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment? Sutherland Global Services is seeking a motivated individual to join our International Process team as a Voice Customer Support Specialist!


* Why Sutherland? Make a Global Impact: Provide exceptional support to customers worldwide, ensuring a positive brand experience. Fast-Paced & Rewarding: Thrive in a dynamic environment with opportunities for growth and lucrative incentives. Supportive Team Culture: Work collaboratively with a team dedicated to providing excellent customer service.
*The Role: As a Customer Support Specialist, you'll be the voice of Sutherland, resolving customer inquiries and ensuring their satisfaction.


*Be a Communication Master: Utilize your excellent English communication skills to effectively interact with customers over various channels. Problem-Solving Pro: Analyze and resolve customer queries efficiently, exceeding expectations at every touchpoint. Embrace Flexibility: Work within a rotational schedule, including night shifts, to provide 24/7 exceptional service.


*Who You Are: A passionate and articulate individual with a genuine desire to help others. You thrive in a fast-paced environment and possess excellent problem-solving skills. Strong computer literacy and basic Microsoft Office/Excel proficiency will be great. A team player who enjoys collaborating with colleagues to achieve shared goals.


*Bonus Points: Experience with customer service or technical support in voice will be an added advantage. Ability to work independently and demonstrate a strong work ethic and manage performance KPIs.


*Benefits Package: Robust benefits package/ net salary + lucrative incentives + Travel Allowance + Quarterly incentives + Overtime Bonus (Subject to different departments). Comprehensive medical insurance + Accident insurance.


*Location: Within Central line [Sion to Dombivali] & Harbour line [Wadala to Panvel]. Some specified railway stations have a cut off of 1.5 kilometers Panvel, Kalyan and Dadar station.Remote work is not currently available for this position. Only candidates residing within the designated travel boundaries can apply.


*Address: 5th Floor, Liberty Tower, Kalwa Industrial Area Thane Belapur Road, Airoli, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400708.


*Email your Cv At HR. Mahi: 9136559570 / Mehjbin.khan2@sutherlandglobal.com


Job Types: Full-time, Permanent,



Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Paid sick time
  • Paid time off
  • Provident Fund

Schedule:

  • Evening shift
  • Night shift
  • Rotational shift
  • UK shift
  • US shift

Supplemental pay types:

  • Overtime pay
  • Performance bonus
  • Quarterly bonus
  • Shift allowance

Education:


  • Higher Secondary(12th Pass) (Preferred)

Experience:

  • total work: 1 year (Required)
  • International voice process: 1 year (Preferred)

Language:


  • English (Preferred)

Work Location: Airoli
